title: ActiveState Komodo IDE 8
description:
ActiveState Komodo IDE 8.0.2 78971 for Windows (x86), Mac OS X (64-bit), Linux (x86, x86 64) [2013, ENG]

Year: 2013
Version: 8.0.2 Build 78971
Developer: ActiveState Software Inc.
Website Developer: www.activestate.com / Komodo-ide
Bit depth: 32bit, 64bit
Language: English
Medicine: Present
Description: Komodo IDE - a program for the development of software, known for its excellent support for popular dynamic languages, including Python, PHP, Ruby, Perl, HTML, CSS and JavaScript. You will enjoy the process of developing a full-featured Komodo IDE:
* Advanced editor;
* Debugging;
* Management of projects and files;
* Team-work;
* Code completion;
* Support for version control and testing;
* Support for extensions;
*, Etc.

System Requirements:

Windows
> Windows XP or later, including Windows 8
> 1GHz (or faster) x86 or x86_64 processor
> 1 GB RAM
> 250 MB hard disk space
> 350 MB of temporary hard disk space during installation
Mac
> Mac OS X 10.6 (Snow Leopard) or later
> Intel processor (x86_64 only)
> 1GB RAM
> 250 MB hard disk space
> 350 MB of temporary hard disk space during installation
Linux
> 1GHz (or faster) x86 or x86_64 processor
> 1 GB RAM
> 250 MB hard disk space
> 350 MB of temporary hard disk space during installation
> System Libraries:
> Glibc 2.4 (or higher) and libjpeg.so.62 (or higher)
> Libstdc + +6 (or higher)
> GTK + 2.10 (or higher)
> Gnome (libgnome, libgnomeui)
The following Linux distributions meet these requirements and are officially supported:
> Red Hat Enterprise Linux 5 or later
> CentOS 5.0 or later
> Fedora Core 8 or later
> OpenSUSE 10.2 or later
> Ubuntu 7.04 or later
> SuSE Linux Enterprise Desktop / Server 11.2 or later
